entry.title: He Worked for Moscow's Police for Nearly 20 Years. Then He Spoke Up About Ukraine.
entry.content: Sergei Klokov now faces 10 years in prison in one of the first known cases under a new Russian law that prohibits spreading information on the war that goes against the Kremlin line.

entry.title: Israel Airstrikes Target Gaza After Rocket Fire Amid Jerusalem Tensions
entry.content: Attack comes hours after Israeli police blocked Jewish marchers from Jerusalem flashpoints.

entry.title: Russian Offensive Bears Down on Donbas as West Races to Supply Ukraine With More Weapons
entry.content: Russian forces made incremental gains in their offensive in eastern Ukraineâ€™s Donbas region, as Western nations rushed more weapons to the outgunned Ukrainian military.
